block.p: Wendy Lynn Mindel, a daughter of Susan Mindel and Dr. Joel Mindel of New York, was married last evening to Nicolas Eric August Rubinstein, the son of Susan and Frederic Rubinstein of Jupiter, Fla., and New York. Rabbi Matthew Gewirtz officiated at the Metropolitan Club in New York.
The bride and bridegroom, both 28, graduated from Brown University, she magna cum laude.

Wendy Lynn Mindel, a daughter of Susan Mindel and Dr. Joel Mindel of New York, was married last evening to Nicolas Eric August Rubinstein, the son of Susan and Frederic Rubinstein of Jupiter, Fla., and New York. Rabbi Matthew Gewirtz officiated at the Metropolitan Club in New York.
The bride and bridegroom, both 28, graduated from Brown University, she magna cum laude.

The bride also received an associate degree in fashion design from the Parsons School of Design. She works for Kay Unger New York, a fashion design company, where she is the design director of its Phoebe line, an evening wear and dress collection for young women.

Her father is a professor of ophthalmology and an associate professor of pharmacology at the Mount Sinai School of Medicine in New York. Her mother is a board member of Pine Manor College and of the Actors Company Theater.
The bridegroom is a vice president and technology industry analyst at Jennison Associates, a money management firm in New York.

His mother owns Consumer Forum, a marketing consulting firm, and is the vice president of the board of the Stanley M. Isaacs Neighborhood Center, a settlement house, both in New York. His father is a partner in Kelley Drye & Warren, a New York law firm.
